alert.note: Alert for Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following county, Collier. * WHEN...Until 500 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 151 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Vineyards, Golden Gate, North Naples, Naples Park, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, East Naples, Naples Manor, Lely Resort, Orangetree, Quail Creek Estate, Pelican Bay and Lely. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
